# Maestro's Favor (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level: [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]]**, [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Component:** V, S, F (a tool)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 day/level or until discharged (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Genius Guide to 110 Spell Variants, Vol. 3 (Super Genius Games), pg. 8

The target is struck by inspiration and gains a +5 luck bonus on its next skill check of the caster's choice.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 to Level.
